title: Not displaying all local folders because windows path length too long SOLVED
content:
I am using Thunderbird V144.0.1 on a computer running Windows 11 Home build 26100. Suddenly, Thunderbird stopped displaying some of my Local Folders. I don't know what I did to cause it; I don't recall making any changes. On investigating the issue, none of the other help I found in the forums or elsewhere on-line worked for me.

While performing one of the instructions, I was trying to copy my Thunderbird profile mail folder to a different location before creating a new profile. Copying the folder gave me an error of a file name being too long. I moved the folder with the too-long file into a different subfolder with a shorter directory name. Lo and behold, all of my folders, including the ones I moved, are now appearing in my Thunderbird Local Folders.

I don't really need any help, but I wanted to post this solution since I didn't encounter it anywhere else.
creator: MisterKarlPrivate

title: Zámraz při přijetí nové zprávy
content: Dobrý den, poslední dobou se začalo stávat, že pokud přijde nová zpráva, tak mi Tundrebird zamrzne. Musím ukončit přes správce úloh, znovu spustit a následně je Thnuderbird funkční i s nově přijatou zprávou. Paradoxně se toto chování Thunderbirdu děje náhodně. Například v pátek to bylo celý den bez problémů. Dnes do cca 8:00 také v pohodě a po osmé to začalo opět zamrzat. Zkoušel jsem ukončovat jednotlivé běžící programy, jestli náhodou nejsou v konfliktu, ale na nic jsem nepřišel. Nevíte náhodou někdo co s tím?
creator: Radas

title: 「あなたの Thunderbird プロファイルを読み込めませんでした。プロファイルが存在しないかアクセスできません。」というメッセージが出た場合の対処法について
content: Thunderbirdをアンインストールしたあと、インストールし直しましたが、「あなたの Thunderbird プロファイルを読み込めませんでした。プロファイルが存在しないかアクセスできません。」というメッセージが出て、Thunderbirdを起動できません。その場合、どうしたらいいでしょうか。

Inoltre, vorrei chiedere se c'è la possibilità di riportare in vita THUNDERPEC

title: Rispondere ad una mail con un modello preconfigurato
content: Buongiorno a tutti... ho la necessità di rispondere a parecchie mail con dei modelli da me precedentemente creati. Sarebbe ideale avere vicino al classico tasto "Rispondi", anche un tasto con "Rispondi con ", dove all'interno trovo dei modelli da me creati precedentemente. (Per Esempio :Mail di risposta preconfigurate, file di testo, immagini , link, ecc.) Esiste già qualcosa di simile da poter eventualmente aggiungere? Grazie MARCO
creator: marcoletti1964

title: Thunderbird receive emails
content: Hi, I just installed thunderbird and setup a yahoo email and everything seemed to go OK but it is not receiving/downloading emails, I have checked all the settings given by yahoo and searched on here and the internet but not found anything much that seems relevant so any help would be welcome.
creator: Fw190

title: Copying filters
content:
I have two accounts set up on Thunderbird. One new one with just the basic sub folders and an old one (no longer 'functional' due to failed service provider) which has many sub folders.

I have a multitude of filters on the old account directing incoming emails to appropriate sub folders and I want the same filters on the new account. Is there any way of just copying the old filters to the new account to save redoing each individual filter from scratch?

(Uptodate Thunderbird 144.0 (64-bit) on Win 10 desktop)

Any advice welcome Thank you
creator: firefox3179

title: Default "Attachment Save(As) Folder / Directory"
content:
Hi,

Where can I change in the settings the default Attachment Save(As) Folder / Directory. That Folder is also used by extract-em (for "save individual attachments"). On my installation it defaults to c:\user\myname\desktop but I can't find a way to change that location.

Another question : is there a way to disable the standard TB attachment Save(As) (shown at the bottom of a message) and replace it completely by extract-em ?

Thank you
